questions.question: This arc is the first in the series and introduces Monkey D. Luffy and his aspiration to become the Pirate King. What is...?
This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' journey to an island in the Grand Line, where they battle against the Warlord of the Sea, Crocodile. What is...?
This arc features Luffy's desperate battle at Marineford to save his brother Ace, leading to a war between the Marines and Whitebeard's pirates. What is...?
This ability, often used by Monkey D. Luffy, drastically increases his speed and power, and changes his skin to a reddish color. What is...?
This power, belonging to a member of the Straw Hat crew, allows the user to sprout limbs and duplicate body parts. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows its user to turn themselves and anything they touch invisible. What is...?
This character, a member of the Worst Generation, possesses the ability to create a 'Room' and manipulate objects and people within it. Who is...?
This former captain of the Sun Pirates and fish-man is known for his tragic past and his nickname 'Jinbe the Knight of the Sea'. Who is...?
This captain of the Red Hair Pirates is known for his laid-back demeanor and being one of the Four Emperors. Who is...?
